author: gdaniels
msg: Add an option to the AdminService which enables/disables remote
administration capability.  Default is off (i.e. only localhost can admin
the server).  To switch it on, you set the "enableRemoteAdmin"
option to "true" in your server-config.xml file.

author: gdaniels
msg: Add an optional "basePath" param to the AxisEngine constructor.  This
allows us to default the location of the axis.properties and config.xml
files.  The AdminServlet sets this to the webapp's WEB-INF directory
Sketch in some support for limiting access to the Admin service.  Right
now this means not letting any non-local IP address access the service.
Also added an "admin password" property which in the future could be
shipping with a default value, then no admin activity would be allowed
on the server until the user first changed the password.

author: dug
msg: Forgot to commit this change to DateSerializer for the makeValue change.

author: dug
msg: makeValue needs to be public so non-Axis packages can create ser/deser's
